text: @DrDenaGrayson @FT @jburnmurdoch Will you address a couple things : the number of flu related deaths in 2020 are substantially down, why? Also why are hospitals getting paid for covid-19 causes of deaths?   This is a giant conflict of interest so therefore I don’t trust these deaths counts!
